roleset.name: hold sacred, enclose in shrine

example.name: enshrine
example.text: ...in their own constitution they have enshrined the universal declaration on human rights which *T* guarantees certain religious freedoms.
example.arg: the universal declaration on human rights which *T* guarantees certain religious freedoms.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: It is true , acknowledges Chou , that Chen Shui - bian has changed his basic stance and now says that he " will not change the country 's name , declare independence , or seek to enshrine the state - to - state principle in the constitution . "

roleset.note: ENSHRINE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from enshrine.01-v)
